Sentencas: single chamber solid oxide fuel cells, SC-SOFCs, design and performance is discussed.
Titulo: On the single chamber solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is shown that all of them operate on non-selective anodes.
Titulo: On the single chamber solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: They operate on cathodes that become selective only under short residence times.
Titulo: On the single chamber solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: As a result these cells are not functioning as true mixed reactant solid oxide fuel cells (MR-SOFC).
Titulo: On the single chamber solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The lack of selectivity is a serious draw back.
Titulo: On the single chamber solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: True MR-SOFC can be constructed in ways that make them cheaper in fabrication, providing high power density, high fuel utilization and reduced explosion risk.
Titulo: On the single chamber solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The fact that SOFCs operate in a single cell is a necessary but not sufficient condition for the proper operation of MR-SOFCs.
Titulo: On the single chamber solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The selectivity looked for the anode and cathode is of a special kind.
Titulo: On the single chamber solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It selects between electrochemical and chemical reactions, preferring the first ones.
Titulo: On the single chamber solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Results reported here suggest that MR-SOFC can operate only up to similar to 600 degrees C. At these relative low temperatures, materials other than oxides can also be considered for use.
Titulo: On the single chamber solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Future directions in the needed research in order to develop true MR-SOFCs are discussed.
Titulo: On the single chamber solid oxide fuel cells
